name: ChronoBreach Ultra
description:
• Warp time to outsmart your enemies
  • Eliminate dangerous foes with an arsenal of weapons
  • Phase through dangerous levels and avoid deadly obstacles
  • Gather Circuits to unlock new weapons and skins
  • Take on the Arena and fight for survival
  • Attempt Speedrun Mode to prove your swiftness and conquer time entirely

ChronoBreach Ultra includes tons of challenging levels, unfamiliar enemies, and brand new weapons.
Play carefully and use all of your abilities to your advantage to come out on top!
